overview: 24 unforgettable hours with Cléa Gaultier: wake up, have breakfast, go to the gym, go shopping, do a photo shoot, have an evening out... You’ll share each of these moments with Cléa Gaultier, in an unprecedented immersive and sexual experience.You’d better be able to go the distance because Cléa lets her wild libido take the reins from morning to night! With strangers, friends or professional contacts, every meetup is a good opportunity for her to take pleasure and, above all, to give pleasure. At the end of this one-of-a-kind day, not only will you know all the secrets of Cléa’s private life, but also you’ll have gotten a front-row seat to share in her fantasies... up close and personal!
title: A Day with Clea
